text:
[Verse]
Walking down the street
Sunshine on my face
City sounds so sweet
In this crazy place

[Verse 2]
Jukebox in the park
Kids are running wild
Dancing till it's dark
Feeling like a child

[Chorus]
Oh summer dream
You're my favorite scene
Bright and free I gleam
In this summer dream

[Bridge]
Ice cream melting fast
Laughter fills the air
Moments meant to last
Without a single care

[Verse 3]
Stars begin to glow
Moonlight in our eyes
Time just moves so slow
Underneath the skies

[Chorus]
Oh summer dream
You're my favorite scene
Bright and free I gleam
In this summer dream
title: Summer Dream
